sentences.english: And so there is deformation,friction effects,tidal effects and so on.
sentences.chinese: 形變，摩擦，潮汐作用等等。

sentences.english: When the beach angle is small, the over-height caused by tides is very profound.
sentences.chinese: 當海岸沙灘傾角較小時，由潮汐產生的超高非常明顯。

sentences.english: Some scientists are working hard at how tide can be harnessed to produce electricity.
sentences.chinese: 科學家正在努力研究怎樣利用潮汐發電。

sentences.english: Corrosion resistances of nickel alloys in tidal zone are better than in fully immersion zone.
sentences.chinese: 鎳合金在潮汐區的耐蝕性比全浸區好。

sentences.english: Others were gathering a second expedition to the tide pools.
sentences.chinese: 另一些人聚攏在一起，準備再來一次潮汐池遠征。

sentences.english: And what mechanism can get rid of the silicate core that has not been broken by the tides?
sentences.chinese: 硅酸鹽核心又是在何種機理作用下不被潮汐力摧毀？

sentences.english: There are many bay-drowned-valley tidal inlets and Sandbar-lagoon tidal inlets in Hainan island.
sentences.chinese: 海南島存在着大量港灣溺谷型和砂壩瀉湖型潮汐汊道。

sentences.english: Some scientists are hard at how use of tidal power.
sentences.chinese: 一些科學家們正在努力研究怎樣利用潮汐發電。

sentences.english: In tidal ports, depths are almost always calculated with the lowest low water line as zero line.
sentences.chinese: 在潮汐式港口，將最低水位計作零水位。

sentences.english: The ebb and flow of the tide is constant.
sentences.chinese: 這個潮汐的潮漲和潮落是永不停止的。

sentences.english: The simulated hypoxia phenomena develop during the neap tide and disappear during the spring tide .
sentences.chinese: 缺氧現象的發展與減退受潮汐漲落的影響。

sentences.english: Tidal and wave energy could offer a second chance.
sentences.chinese: 開發潮汐能可能是下一個機會。

sentences.english: While swimming you always need to be aware of rip tides and rip currents.
sentences.chinese: 當你游泳時需要意識到潮汐的時節和此時潮水的趨勢。

sentences.english: The unusual tides caused glaciers to calve icebergs off Greenland.
sentences.chinese: 這種不尋常的潮汐使得格陵蘭的冰川崩裂成冰山。

sentences.english: The earliest occurrences date from the Middle Ages, or even from Roman times.
sentences.chinese: 最早的潮汐能應用可追溯到中世紀，甚至是羅馬時期。

sentences.english: These devices act like underwater windmills, with blades that rotate as the tide flows through them.
sentences.chinese: 這種裝置就像水下風車一樣，葉片隨流過的潮汐旋轉。

definition: (of a tide) to ebb or go out
(of water, prices etc) to rise and fall
storm/violent commotion/fig. crisis (e.g. revolution, uprising, financial crisis etc)
to surge up violently (of ocean, river, lake etc)/turbulent
